markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />manipulate;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You touch an adjacent creature and attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against one [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) or [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) afflicting the creature. On a success, you halt the effects of the poison or disease for 1 day, rather than removing it. This temporarily relieves any penalties imposed by the affliction but doesn't cure the effect or count against its duration; the poison or disease is merely halted for a time, and it resumes where it left off once this effect ends.
